A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Leave your expectations at the door. 
 
Hard core fans (which I am!) should NOT expect a film filled with our fan fiction baggage of what we'd love to see happen with our old gang from the OT.  

What we do get is different\, original and epic!  

I do feel there are missed opportunities with some of the character arcs presented here and some plot lines go in directions that are honestly not neccessary.  

"This is not going to go the way you think\," Luke Skywalker says in the trailer. 

Take it to heart and enjoy.
  
I have no idea how JJ is going to piece this all together now...
